attributes.action: To bring in life sentences for all paedophiles to get rid of this problem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need life sentances for all paedophiles to reduce this menace to are country by locking them up
so are children are safe and it will also stop reoffending

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
